author: Dominic Jermey, Dominic Jermey
title: Humanity's exploitation of wildlife is putting us all at risk
description: Bringing animal trafficking under control must be an international priority in the wake of coronavirus
content:
Alongside my disbelief, horror and sadness at the spread of the Covid-19 pandemic, my main emotions are anger and frustration. Frustration that the pandemic we are living through was predictable and preventable.
Weve spoken many times about the roots of Covi… [+5365 chars]
